text: Ittila-e-aam hai Allah aur uske Rasool ki taraf se hajj e Akbar ke din tamaam logon ke liye ke Allah mushrikeen se bari uz-zimma (free from the treaty obligations ) hai aur uska Rasool bhi. Ab agar tum log tawba karlo to tumhare hi liye behtar hai aur jo mooh pherte ho to khoob samajh lo ke tum Allah ko aajiz karne waley nahin ho. Aur (aey Nabi), inkar karne walon ko sakht azaab ki khushkhabri suna do
